title: Fiddlesticks is strong right?
body:
How come {{champion:9}} isn't played in Mid Lane more often?
He has everything a mage needs and wants:
Targeted CC
High Damage
High Sustain
Gapclosing potential with Ult (Roaming).

replies.body: None of his abilties are good for killing lane minions. And you cant roam effectively when it takes you 10-15 seconds to clear a wave. If you level e first to try to improve this its still not that great and you become significantly less effective vs champions
Because he just works better in the jungle over middle.

Mana problems mostly. Who knows, maybe smite mid Fidd with the new item?

No real escape, can fear 1 person but theres always 2 in a gank.

Yeah, I guess it's the high mana cost.
His silence works really well against casters so you just fear the AA reliant one and silence the one that needs spells to gank you.
